BR_text.BRsummary: get_weapon() in init.lua assumes that unit contains weapon types.
BR_text.BRdescription:
In <denchmark-link:https://github.com/TorchCraft/TorchCraft/blob/master/lua/init.lua#L230>https://github.com/TorchCraft/TorchCraft/blob/master/lua/init.lua#L230</denchmark-link>
 , it is assumed that the unit contains  and  fields. These fields seem to have been replaced with damage types, i.e.  and . While the remaining code correctly treats these as "damage type" (in contrast to its name, ), the non-existent fields will produce wrong results when passed to . This can lead to wrong results for  and  .
